No, that thread title is not a lie, this is real. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ysnet/shenmue-3/](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ysnet/shenmue-3/)

I laughed. I cried. Shut up and take my money, Suzuki-sama! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):D:D:D:D:D

- - - Updated - - -

The passion is real. The hype is real. 1.4 million raised in 5 hours and counting. 14 long years . . **we did it**, folks.

I can't say that I've heard of it, but I do wish it for the best. Just remember that 14 years is a long time, a good portion of the creative talent behind the originals have sought employment elsewhere, despite some of it currently trying to drive the creation of the new game.

It always is nice though, to hear someone giving the old classics the attention they deserve.

> 
> I can't say that I've heard of it, but I do wish it for the best. Just remember that 14 years is a long time, a good portion of the creative talent behind the originals have sought employment elsewhere, despite some of it currently trying to drive the creation of the new game.
> It always is nice though, to hear someone giving the old classics the attention they deserve.

Basically, this was the game that was never supposed to happen. This is like a Half Life 3 moment for Sega fans. I'm still a bit lightheaded over the announcement, no exaggeration! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Imagine feeling this since 2001:
